name: Little Island Champs
description:
Controls:

W - move forward

A - turn left

S - move backward

D - turn right

Left mouse - shoot

1 - transform into selected car

2 - transform into selected boat

3 - transform into selected plane

Description:

Little Island Champs is a game where the player is a little toy that can transform into other toys to help maneuver around the arena. Cars are good on land, boats are good on water, and planes are great all around. There are two different game modes that the player can chose from. The only objective is to destroy as many of the enemy team as possible without running out of respawns. Each team has a certain amount of respawns. When a team reaches zero respawns, they lose.
